WorkItem.Description:
Everytime i retrieve my charater (from a FRESH start of the program) from the armory, ALL the possible buffs are checked under the BUFFS tab.  I have to uncheck them all eveytime.  Is there something i can do to prevent that?  or is it by default like that?
Â 
TIA

Comments.Message: Some modules apply default raid buffs when loading a new character, some modules don't. Having an easy way to (de)select  standard raid buffs, check box or something that will select all standard buffs, would be a nice addition.

A) We're working on a system for buff sets to make it quick and easy to swap between preset/custom groups of buffs, just like talents.
B) Why do you want to uncheck all the buffs when you load from Armory? You may be doing something wrong, if you usually want to uncheck all buffs.
Thx for the clarification. Keep up the good work.
